bullets: Built and shipped Winston, an agentic AI tutoring platform for institutional deployment (course-aware tutoring, persistent personalization, proactive support).
Implemented the core tutoring pipeline: RAG over instructor content, embedding-based retrieval + topic suggestions, and LLM + HITL rubric generation and FRQ grading.

Productionized and shaped product direction: long-term memory with ARQ workers, prompt versioning/evals in Arize Phoenix, Postgres + pgvector, plus weekly client briefs and competitive/academic research.
Led an intern project automating database accuracy via ServiceNow REST API; improved tracking of ~1000 assets and contributed to an estimated $10,000+ per month in savings.
Automated XML transformation testing using Python + Batch scripting; delivered digestible review outputs and saved 10+ hours per month for the team.
Wrote a Python library for transforming/reading/writing CSV & JSON.
Maintained a Secret security clearance and shipped tooling in a restricted environment with limited external resources.
Maintained records/databases to support mission accessibility.
Obtained Secret security clearance after full background investigation.
Supported transition of thousands of employees to a cloud suite and facilitated org comms.
